chunk:
Anokha Tsubaki & Bakuchiol Eye Crème

Brand: Anokha

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: aqua/water/eau, Astrocaryum murumuru (murumuru) seed butter, glycerin, cetearyl olivate, sorbitan olivate, Camellia japonica (tsubaki) seed oil, caprylhydroxamic acid, glyceryl caprylate, stearyl alcohol, bakuchiol, caffeine, sodium hyaluronate, phospholipids, xanthan gum, sodium phytate, leuconostoc/radish root ferment filtrate
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
